info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 23 at 11:02PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVIER SNOWFALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ROAN AND TAVAPUTS PLATEAUS AND GRAND VALLEY COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavier snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. Snowy and icy roads will bring difficult driving conditions. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...This area of heavier snowfall is bringing slick roads to the I-70 corridor in the Grand Valley from Mack through Fruita, Grand Junction, into Palisade. This area is moving east at 20 mph. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Grand Junction, Fruita, Palisade, Loma, Fruitvale, Clifton, Orchard Mesa and Redlands. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this area of snowfall. Rapid changes in visibility and slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
